file.name: product.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: This is demo yaml
  version: '1.0.0'
  title: demo yaml

servers:
  - description: target server
    url: 'http://127.0.0.1:5000/rest/'

paths:
  /product:
    get:
      summary: Get product information
      description: the product information
      tags:
        - Product
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Successfully get product info'
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductInfoList'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/500'
    post:
      summary: Add new Product
      tags:
        - Product
      resquestBody:
        description: The product information
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductAddInfo'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: Successfully added the product
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                description: 'the added product id'
                type: object
                required:
                  - id
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: integer
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/400'
        '500':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/500'

components:
  schemas:
    ProductAddInfo:
      description: the new added product info
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - price
        - catagory
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        price:
          type: number
        catagory:
          type: string

    ProductInfo:
      description: the product information
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - price
        - catagory
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        price:
          type: number
        catagory:
          type: string

    ProductInfoList:
      description: The product list
      type: object
      required:
        - products
      properties:
        products:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProductInfo'

    ErrorResponse:
      description: The error response
      type: object
      required:
        - message
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

  responses:
    '400':
      description: 'wrong parameters'
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
    '500':
      description: 'Internal Error'
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ErrorResponse'
